author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.gran-turismo.com/

On 15 August 2025 (local time) at 'The Quail, A Motorsports Gathering' Chevrolet announced the Corvette CX.R Vision Gran Turismo Concept, a race car concept that pays homage to the role motorsports has played in Corvette’s nearly 75 year history, and hints at what future Corvette track vehicles may look like. The CX.R Vision Gran Turismo Concept debuted alongside the Corvette CX Concept. These two vehicles will inspire Corvette design language for years to come.

The Corvette CX.R Vision Gran Turismo Concept is a model made exclusively for the track.

The aerodynamics of this car started with the CX design and amped up the aggression, with more prominent active aerofeatures and a lower ride height for downforce and grip. CX.R employs light-weight materials, including carbon fibre, to keep total mass as low as possible.

It is powered by a hybrid system utilising two electric motors up front and one motor in the rear, combined with a compact high revving
title: Gran Turismo 7 - Corvette CX.R Vision Gran Turismo Concept Unveiled | PS5 & VR2 Games

title: Midnight Murder Club leaves Early Access 🔦

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015385

Meet a cast of magnet characters and work together to solve logical conundrums across multiple worlds and dozens of levels. Developed by Mark Brown, creator of the popular YouTube channel Game Maker’s Toolkit (GMTK), Mind Over Magnet is a blast for players of all ages and skill levels! 

Available now on the PlayStation Store!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Mind Over Magnet - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
